code: import axios from"axios";var api=axios.create({baseURL:"https://api.themoviedb.org/3/",params:{api_key:"8b290469081332353c49ea5336f3de79",language:"en-US"}});export var moviesApi={nowPlaying:function nowPlaying(){return api.get("movie/now_playing");},upcoming:function upcoming(){return api.get("movie/upcoming");},popular:function popular(){return api.get("movie/popular");},movieDetail:function movieDetail(id){return api.get("movie/".concat(id),{params:{append_to_response:"videos"}});},search:function search(term){return api.get("search/movie",{params:{query:encodeURIComponent(term)}});}};export var tvApi={topRated:function topRated(){return api.get("tv/top_rated");},popular:function popular(){return api.get("tv/popular");},airingToday:function airingToday(){return api.get("tv/airing_today");},showDetail:function showDetail(id){return api.get("tv/".concat(id),{params:{append_to_response:"videos"}});},search:function search(term){return api.get("search/tv",{params:{query:encodeURIComponent(term)}});}};
